legacy.full_text: On Sept 8, the 23rd China International Investment and Trade Fair opened in Xiamen. Follow China Daily reporter Chen Ye, and find the golden key to global cooperation and explore the secrets behind China's two-way communication and cooperation with the world. #CIFIT https://t.co/1rfUd9Qjkc
https://t.co/v32ntOSVmt

tags.name: 中华人民共和国商务部MOFCOM
中华人民共和国商务部MOFCOM

legacy.full_text: 🎉The 23rd #CIFIT concluded in #Xiamen, #Fujian today. The grand four-day event, with 98 activities being held, attracted about 80,000 business people🕴️ from 106 countries and regions, and reached agreements on 638 projects with total investments of $66.4 billion.👏 https://t.co/ovAF7tLRcy
Another year of exciting achievements! A record-breaking 638 project deals with a combined investment value of 484.57 billion yuan ($66.4 billion). #CIFIT #23rdCIFIT 😍

legacy.full_text: Have you ever heard of the Chinese folktale of how a young man, Xu Xian, falls in love with the white snake maiden Bai Suzhen at the Broken Bridge on #WestLake? legacy.full_text: This is Hongshan Ruins Museum in #Wuxi, built on the remains of a burial mound from the ancient Yue Kingdom.👇It is the only #heritage #museum themed around remains from the Spring and Autumn period (770-476BC) in #China, offering exhibits of the local unearthed cultural relics. https://t.co/UxqD81SwnI
